Grimlock quickly changed to beast mode after his sensors warned him 
that a transformer was heading in his wake. Grimlock quietly moved in 
to the brushes which the pod landed in until he could see the 
transformer coming towards him.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Zardus/DeathStorm::
> 
> In the alliance base, the comp beeps as it detects a new stasis
pod. 
Zardus 
> looks at the screen.
> 
> "Proquest," He says into his comm-link, "Can you check out the new 
pod."
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Somewhere in the ship DeathStorm nods.
> 
> "On my way." He replies to Zardus and flies out of the base,
heading 
for 
> Grimlock's position.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Back on the bridge, Zardus recieves Icedeamon's distress call. 
"Retreat back 
> to base, Icedeamon."
